name: Sit ups
description: 90 degree leg bend, laying on your back, sit up until elbows are passed your knees.

name: Push ups
description: Arms at your side, bend so your elbows so they remain close to your body and lower your body until close to the floor.

name: Dead Lifts
description: Lift made from a standing position without the aid of bench.

name: Lat pull down
description: While seated, you pull a hanging bar toward you to reach chin level, then release it back up.

name: Rowing
description: Utilising a rowing machine to simulate the rowing action.
